channel.title: Anybody able to use :chalreq: [317] Delta

item.title: Anybody able to use :chalreq: [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Iamme, post:2, topic:390297”]idk about the :chalreq:

But as far as the custom title… Idk if this is different for delta. BUt this is for mine.

first go to commands.java and search for yell.

Once you get to it, add this under it.

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Iamme")){ rank = "@blu@[Owner] @rde@["+ c.playerName +"] : "; }
Ok, so change iamme to your name, and the @blu@ makes your title blue. And the @rde@ makes it red.[/quote]

:chalreq: should only be accepted in the Duel Arena.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody able to use :chalreq: [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @Iamme Iamme
item.description:
@Iamme wrote:

idk about the :chalreq:

But as far as the custom title… Idk if this is different for delta. BUt this is for mine.

first go to commands.java and search for yell.

Once you get to it, add this under it.

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Iamme")){ rank = "@blu@[Owner] @rde@["+ c.playerName +"] : "; }
Ok, so change iamme to your name, and the @blu@ makes your title blue. And the @rde@ makes it red.

item.title: Anybody able to use :chalreq: [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

Hello, I was wondering if there was some way to make “:chalreq:” Only useable for staff. I found this annoying as any player can use it, and I could not find a single way of changing this. Also, is there some way to make say… my title, do this automatically when I ::yell?

} if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Owner] "; }

Read full topic
